Title: 13 - 3D Models And Rendering
Tip: Focus on loading completed 3D Models levage the shape model from 2D

Summary.What: Render existing 3D models and scenes using Three.js primitives.
Summary.Why: Thr right tool for the job, we just need to share models on the web, not build video games.
Summary.How: Use an open source library to integrate Blazor with Three.js.

Samples.Tip: First let's recognize that .Net is a giving Community, Thank You Roman giving me access to your Blazor / Three.js integration
Load models using a prerender method
Primitives do not require async loading
